titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1232) to require a five-year staffing plan for the Department of State, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1232) to require a five-year staffing plan for the Department of State, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1232) To require a five-year staffing plan for the Department of State.
